subject: Could not find class:
msgSnippet: Hello, anybody knows how I can solve this: I run this from my cammandline: $java org.junit.runner.JUintCore TestX or $java org.junit.runner.JUintCore
messageBody:
Hello,
anybody knows how I can solve this:

I run this from my cammandline:

$java org.junit.runner.JUintCore TestX

or

$java org.junit.runner.JUintCore junit.samples.SimpleTest

But I get errormsg:

"No tests found in TestX"


I have also tried to move around in the directorys to stand where
SimpleTest is (i.e. the directory whicj contains SimpleTest).

My path variables are set right I think:

CLASSPATH:

C:\junit4.1\junit-4.1.jar;.org.junit.runner.JUnitCore;


My classes look like this:


import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
//import junit.framework.Test;
//import junit.framework.TestCase;
//import junit.framework.TestSuite;
import static org.junit.Assert.*;
import org.junit.*;
import java.util.*;


public class X {
@Test
public int met (int number) {
int num = number;
if (num > 1)
return num*2;
else{
return 666;
}
}
}


////////////////////////////////////////////////////

import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
//import junit.framework.Test;
import junit.framework.TestCase;
//import junit.framework.TestSuite;
import static org.junit.Assert.*;
import org.junit.*;
import java.util.*;


public class TestX extends TestCase {
@Test
public static void main (String args[]){
X y = new X();
System.out.println(y.met(1));
}
}




I hope someone can help me with this?

Magnus
